segments.text: This kitchen is turning into a disgusting mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water from the sink is sloshing all over the place.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman's standing ankle-deep in filthy puddle water.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How gross that she's oblivious to the soaking floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy's grubby hands are in the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That stool looks dirty and ready to collapse.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl begging for cookies like a little pest.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Open cabinets spilling crumbs everywhere probably.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Wet cabinets doors streaked with waterâ€”yuck.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Dishes piled up, who knows how unclean they are.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Even the window view can't hide the sloppiness inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't stand seeing such neglect in a home.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole scene is just repulsive.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone clean this up before it's worse.
segments.speaker: PAR
